title: ［重要！］將警察對記者使用武力既片send比CNN

replies.msg:
唔好意思阻阻巴絲時間
商台嗰邊出左條佢地記者被警方打嘅片，因為想推俾國際媒體嗰邊知呢件事，所以譯左條片。麻煩大家幫手send出去，將條片send俾啲媒體嘅email同喺Twitter度pm俾啲記者。尤其係cnn，因為佢地本身已經懷疑警方唔理三七二十一就使用武力
下面會有晒email格式同link。可以的話send埋俾身邊朋友一齊做呢件事，令啲媒體係每日成千上萬嘅meesage之中都見到。唔該晒咁多位！

youtube link:
https://youtu.be/5M6co2WEJEI
(可以的話麻煩back一backup 廢事被人del)

To: community@cnn.com

Topic:
Regarding Hong Kong Police Force Attacking Reporters On 12/6

Email:
Dear editor,

It was suspected by CNN that the police used force during the protest. Here is the evidence.

One of the organization in the HK media industry, Commercial Radio Hong Kong News (CRHKNEWS) , has recorded a video which proves that the police used violence to anyone regardless their identity , such as reporters. The link of the post and video are as follow.
https://zh-hk.facebook.com/crhknews/videos/2420096214722357/
The translation of the caption:
警方晚上在金鐘正義路驅散示威者期間，本台記者在採訪期間多次表明身份，受警員多次推撞，記者並無大礙。
While the police were dispersing protesters at Justice Drive at Admiralty, our reporters had been stating their identity repeatedly ,but were still pushed and confronted by the police for several times. The reporter is safe now.

The attached video (with subtitles) posted by CRHK NEWS on facebook shows the conversation between the police, protesters and reporters.

Hope it is useful for you to reveal the truth.

Yours faithfully,
(自己個名)

注意send email個陣可以attach youtube link, 因為原片file size太大
Copy and paste attach埋條link就搞掂
推

唔好只係focus喺CNN
我哋要有系統咁send俾外國台灣中外媒體！

對外國(人)嚟講
逃犯條例變相容許中國威脅勒索
大家都知中國最叻就係製作"犯人"
話個外國遊客係中國犯咗啲乜乜事/法，然後要香港引導佢上去
估計大家都重記得北韓囚禁美國大學生瓦姆比爾拎佢嚟同侵侵講數
而且最近都有加拿大前外交官係中國被拘捕
如果香港過咗逃犯條例，咁外國就要被迫因為中國有人質係手而屈服/談判，畢竟外國民主政府要回應民眾壓力要求營救被囚國民
所以外國人/護照持有者都不能獨善其身
請廣傳

所有資料ready之後發信比各國領事表揚香港警察世界第一

麻煩幫手copy and share
唔好淨係推
我一個人能力有限
Fb ig 都可以share
再叫你身邊既人share

如你手上有關於2019年6月12日 香港警察對市民 記者 議員 使用過份或不必要的暴力的圖片 影片 聲音檔案 請用以下方法發送到各大媒體! 請廣傳!

If you have any visual evidence or audio recordings of Hong Kong police exerting excessive and unnecessary violence on protesting Hong Kong citizens, journalists, and legislative officials on 12th June. 2019, please send them to the media attached below! Please spread this message!

回應左
Thank you for your submission.
We endeavour to read all correspondence as soon as possible, however we cannot respond to each individual post.
In some cases your comments may be used on BBC output.
We will publish your name as you provide it (unless you ask us not to) but we will never publish your contact details.
Please read our terms and conditions and privacy policy.
Many thanks.
